thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Chinese Developer Cuts Losses After Tech Rescue Mission Fails

author: Dominique Fong
title: Chinese Developer Cuts Losses After Tech Rescue Mission Fails
text:
BEIJING—Property tycoon Sun Hongbin has played the white knight for troubled companies. Now he is letting one go, saying that he wasn’t able to save a debt-plagued video-streaming venture.
Mr. Sun, chairman of developer Sunac China Holdings Ltd., said his company’s investment of 15 billion yuan—or $2.4 billion—in Leshi Internet Information & Technology Corp. was a “failure.”
“For...
